content.detailedDescription:
my daughters (6 years and 4 years) and i were driving on interstate 40 west (mile marker 84) headed into russellville when in front of us, maybe a half-mile to a mile, was a triangular shaped object slowly passing over the interstate. i do not remember it coming into view quickly especially since it seemed to be moving so slowly, only that it
appeared and my daughters and i all noticed even as i was yelling for them to look.  there was a radiant multi-colored prism like light at each of the corners, and a small flashing red light in between the two rear lights. the lights definitely were not those of any aircraft, as they were almost ball like and the rays or the light source itself seemed to have a glowing life or activity about them. the object appeared to be slightly tilted at about 20 degrees but at the moment was not turning, only drifting directly across us.  my youngest daughter immediately upon seeing the object asked, "what is that daddy?" to which my oldest immediately responded, "a spaceship!" i go to grab my phone and notice the craft begin to arc in a horshoe, a slow deliberate curve away. i pull our vehicle over onto the shoulder of the interstate, against the wishes of my oldest daughter, and check my mirrors and wait for a semi to pass to get out.  when i look back, it is further away and when i get my cell phone up to snap, it is gone behind the tree line.  it didnt zoom away but definitely seemed to speed up somewhat, although its lights never turned from the original direction they were facing, even when pulling the arc away behind the tree line.  my heart was pounding, it was so real and intense and obviously not an airplane, or aircraft as we would think of them.  i got back in the blazer and we sped to pass the tree line and view the sky openly. when we broke past the curve and saw the sky wide open there was nothing that could explain what we just saw, and upon it seeming to disappear, my daughter inquisitively asked, "daddy, was it an alien spaceship?"  i hope this helps with anything, and if you need anything else please e-mail me at dyliho@yahoo.Com

     sincerely,  matthew dylan foster
content.summary: Triangular object (slightly tilted) - multi-colored prism like lightson all corners passed approximately half-mile to a mile in front of us perpendiculary, then made graceful arc back behind tree line

content.detailedDescription:
Saturday, november 21st, 2009 will be a day that i will never forget. i was on madeira beach with some friends and family after a funeral we had for my father earlier that day. we were on the beach setting off some fireworks when i looked to the south side of the beach and noticed two very bright blue orbs twirling in the sky. i immediately ran for my camera and shouting "ufo's! ufo's!" it took me about 10 minutes to find where i had packed my camera. just as soon as i got back to the beach ready to film, the orbs descended to the water. i thought that i had missed my chance, only to find out a few minutes later that they were coming back. i captured almost 30 minutes of these ufo's flying near madeira beach. the manueverability and speed of these things was unlike anything i've ever seen, or heard of. their shape was like that of a ouija board planchette, sort of like a stretched-out heart. i noticed a couple of times while they were turning, they seemed flat, whereas sometimes they seemed like an orb. they would pulsate every once in a while from a light, bright blue, to a bright red, and sometimes a teal/green. it seemed like they would change color when they would do a sharp turn, sort of like a sailfish when its hunting prey. i noticed that every once in a while, one would move and do a loop and a couple of sharp turns and come to a complete stop and just as soon as one would stop, the other did the exact same thing. once they mimicked each other, they would line up and move in a half-circle in sync with one another. i broke the filming up into 9 parts just to make sure i had at least something on film if one of the files were to become corrupted. the next day, i went onto google maps to try and pinpoint the area in which we saw them flying around. my guess is that they were 3-5 miles south of where we were at. the ufo's were definitely going down to the water, as you can see in the video(unfortunately, i never got them actually becoming submerged). if you get a chance and would like to look at the map yourself, look right along the coast near treasure island, fl. if you look at the map in satellite mode, you'll notice there's an area right off of the coast that google doesn't show you. it might not be anything, but its's kind of peculiar. i checked all of the bay area papers the next couple of days and there was no mention of anything like what we had seen that night. this was just a small explanation of what i had seen that night, if anybody has any questions, i'd be happy to help, or if anybody has any answers, i'd be glad to hear them.

i have all 9 parts on youtube.Com...Look up *must see* ufo's near madeira beach, fl
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Manueverability and speed unlike anything i've ever seen

content.detailedDescription: I was watching planes and there were a lot of them and i saw these two stars very bright. i thought they were the ones i always see there but they were to bright. i noticed they were moving from the north and went east. they started out side by side and ended up behind each other. the distance between them stayed the same. the lights didn't blink and there were no sound.  i tried to get them on video and they were moving faster over the house. i ran out the front door to watch and video them as they went towards erwin over the mountain. that video didn't show. i felt agitated, and stressed right afterwards and still am a little. i was disappointed i didn't get better video. i lightened the video and will change it if you need.
content.summary: Two brightest star like objects moving north to east.

content.detailedDescription:
From my backyard as i approached my shed i looked up and i noticed two bright lights in the sky that were ne part of the sky, moving very slowly-slower than a fixed wing aircraft, no noise -jet or prop was heard. i ran into the house to get a pair of9 x 63 binoculars and i called for my wife to come outside. when i came back outside i was looking for the red, green and white flashing lights that should be on the wings and fuselage. none were visible using the binoculars. no other lights were visible. the objects looked just like 2 extremely bright lights. my wife then looked at them through the binoculars. i asked her if she saw any red, green or other flashing lights. she did not. the objects started to swing to the east and one moved either higher or farther away. then both either moved behind a cloud bank or just flat disappeared.
to size the objects- i know the star constellations that appear around our house at night. the size of these objects would be about half the size of an eraser from a #2 pencil compared to a star in the sky.

i went back inside and called 911 and reported it.

commercial aircraft also observed at 35000 ft way above both objects.
content.summary: Saw 2 brught lights moving slowly south then east

content.detailedDescription: Was outside doing my normal star gazing and out of nowhere, two bright lights appeared in the sky behind my house..  the appeared to be verticle and moving straight up in the sky.  i yelled for my wife and she came out with the camera.  in the mean time, it appeared to have turned horizontal and was travelling over the house in what appeared to be only a few thousand feed up.  i don't even know how to guess how far apart they were but it was definitely two end lights attached to a central object, they never broke apart.  after filming it travel over the house, it appeared to move straight up in the sky until it was out of sight.  just as this video ends, another object shot across the sky but, i did not get that on video.  as i said, i have it on video and i'll try to attach it.  i don't know if it will or not, it's 50 megs.  i must warn you that there is a kid yelling and crying and several cuss words are used in reference to us freaking out over the ufo.
content.summary: 2 bright lights cigar shaped

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were outside smoking, waiting on the pizza to get done, and we both saw 2 white lights following each other at a steady speed. coming from the north west to south east. they were silent and didn't have strobes.  we see aircraft all the time,because we seem to be in a flight path and planes were flying above the lights as they pasted over us. my husband also saw the same lights last night flying side by side.  they came from the opposite direction as the ones from tonight. i am really curious to know what they are. are we being watched?
content.summary: Two white lights following each other, no sound, no strobes.

content.detailedDescription:
I was feeding my dog, looked up seeing two solid lights traveling north east. the light appeared to be attached to the same object. 
at arms length it would have taken two dollar bills end to end to cover it up. usally when i see aircraft i can al least hear the engine, or rotors. i estimate a altitude of about 2000feet, not sure for it being dark outside was judgeing in relation to the mountains. i watched this thing for about 1 1/2 minutes before it vanished. didn't have a camera or phone with me, was feeding my dog not expecting to see anything that needed recording. for some reason i couldn't look away, guess i was amazed to see something like that.
content.summary: Two lights, traveling west, slow speed. no sound, solid light.

content.detailedDescription:
Left my garage after parking my car.  started down my backyard towards my house and looked up.  there was a bright half moon in the sky and what i assumed were stars or planets around it.  i stopped to look up as i often do when i noticed one of the two bright "stars" to the left of the moon seemed to be moving.  my first thought was it must be a satellite.  then i noticed that another of what i took to be a "star" also seemed to be moving.  that's when i noticed that these two moving lights looked as though they were moving on an axis.  the one following the other.  they looked as though they must have been attached to some invisible structure.  it then struck me that if that were the case, this flying invisible what-ever-it-was must have been huge.  it was also totally silent.  i then started fumbling for my cell phone camera, but by the time i got it out the lights had drifted away to the south east and were almost invisible.  i watched as they faded silently away in the direction of some clouds off to the southwest.  then they were gone.  i then noticed what i took to be a conventional aircraft with a flashing light passing across the sky from west to east.  there was nothing unusual about this light, so i just continued on my way into my house.

the object moved slowly and silently from almost directly over my head and off to the southeast.  i could not actually see anything attaching the two lights together, but, as i said, they moved as though they were both part of one large unit, that was hidden by the darkness.
content.summary: Two bright star like lights

content.detailedDescription: At approx. 5:20pm my wife called me outside to see something strange in the sky. i saw two lights that appeared to be stars moving accross the sky from north to south. the objects were approx. 1/2 to 1 mile apart but stayed at a perfectly equal distance from each other.These were not plains, i know because there were plains traveling around the area with flashing lights, not solid ones like the objects.As the objects flew in front of my wife and i one of the objects seemed to get dimmer and dimmer until it eventually disapeared. as that object stared to dim the other one got much brighter. the brightest object a few seconds later also disapeared. less then two seconds later we saw the two objects several miles away traveling up and quickly out of sight.Not sure what it was just thought it was very strange and would like to see if anyone else has seem something like this before
content.summary: Two lights traveling north to south stayed equal distant apart and disapeared

content.detailedDescription: As i parked in my driveway facing east, i saw a lighted craft above the cloud cover over the moon, and i saw this light pretty close and it started to move away in a vector perpendicular to me.  i didn't move until i bothered to grab my camera, it just kept moving away to the point where you see it in the picture.  all the while this cone beam rotating haphazardly around the craft in no set pattern.  just weird.
content.summary: A light with a moving beam

content.detailedDescription:
I went out for my afternoon walk.  when i got back i was looking up toward the north at camp pendelton from carlsbad.  our subdivision sits high and affords a good view.  

i thought first i was seeing one of those chemtrail planes we see a lot of. but this was shiny silver, and it had no wings and no tail and no contrail.  it was traveling about like a jet liner but in an odd path as that is protected military airspace.  you can get shot down for flying over that area.  marine harriers and helicopters frequent that area.

air traffic in and out of san diego either comes along the coast over the pacific from los angeles, or from the east side of san diego county over the salton sea.   it went along at a casual speed and just continued straight out to the pacific ocean, which is a very strange flight path.  it was at an altitude about like the planes that are about to land, but it was not in an landing angle or trajectory and it had no wings.  i estimate its altitude to have been 10-15 thousand feet. it was a very bright clear sunny day yesterday.

i would guess its angle to be roughly in a straight line from fall brook or lake elsinore and over camp pendleton.  i lost sight of it as went out over the pacific ocean.

i thought i might be spooked by a ufo. i just found it rather curious and interesting to watch.  it didn't seem the least bit concerned about who saw it. i've never seen one before, and certainly didn't expect to see a cigar shaped one.

i did not have a camera with me.
content.summary: Cigar shaped  ufo flying east to west over camp pendelton

content.detailedDescription:
We live in a very remote area of california called the lost coast. when my husband got home from town around 8:30 pm, i went outside to greet him. at that point, i noticed two blinking craft (red, blue and white at this point) at about 40 degrees above the horizon. they were moving slowly south. there was a distant jet engine noise at that point and we were about to dismiss it as unusual proximity for two aircraft--maybe a military maneuver. however, at that point we noticed a third very dim light moving south just above the ridge line. when that plane had moved out of sight, the jet sound vanished but the lights suddenly intensified and became a very bright gold and stopped blinking. at this point for a moment they looked to me like the classic saucer-shape with the bubble on the center, though they were too far away for this shape to be seen clearly throughout the sighting. they turned back north and followed approximately the same flight path that they had flown to the south, one behind the other. they started blinking again and at this point my husband noticed a green blinking light on the right side of each craft. 
i ran inside to get my camera just in case they came close enough to film, which they never really did. we both grabbed binoculars and tracked the lights north and south along the same flight path for the next 5 + minutes. they were repeating some sort of maneuver and synchronizing their flight paths. there appeared to be at least a dozen lights of various sizes on each craft, sometimes blinking, sometimes solid, color varying from gold to blue and red to green. when they were blinking i thought they looked like they were in a v-shape (though it was hard to tell through my jumpy binocs). they were so bright and glittering, that as we watched them move silently through the sky we began to feel that these were ufo's. at one point the craft on the left had what appeared to be a central bright light that blinked like a regular aircraft light, but then the light blinked much faster, then became solid, then intensified in brightness to a very bright golden white light. at times there were so many lights visible on each craft that they seemed to glitter. we noted that the lights were not arrayed in a way that would indicate horizontal wings perpendicular to a fuselage, but rather a more 'three dimensional' and complex shape to the craft.

after several minutes of observing these two craft, a very large conventional aircraft (that clearly made the sound of jet engines) with a blinking red light on each wingtip moved in swiftly from the south and flew directly over us at medium  altitude. the aircraft had a very wide wingspan. it banked to the west in the direction of the two craft that at this point were in the northern part of their flight path. the lights on the two craft dimmed and began to move back south. the conventional craft followed at a distance, not really in hot pursuit but maintaining an observational distance. it was apparent that whatever the two ufo craft had been doing was interrupted by the arrival of the conventional aircraft. all three craft went to the south and out of our field of view. to recap, the only time we heard any aircraft noise was at the beginning of the observation (when there was what appeared to be a large commercial craft following a fairly standard path that we have often observed such craft to fly) and at the end, when the large craft moved in to observe what were obviously objects of interest. the rest of the time, we watched the two craft moving in utter silence.
content.summary: Two distant craft with multiple lights flying in formation, doing maneuvers, large conventional craft arrives and they leave area.

content.detailedDescription:
Camera:  cannon sd 970 is 12.1 mp 
         picture shot using timer
where:   san francisco, ca waterfront.  pier 14 (concrete walkway jutting
         out into bay about 150 yards.)  
when:    tuesday, november 24, 2009    6:00 pm

purpose was to take pictures of the embarcadero center xmas lighting.  camera set on timer.  tripod used.  second shot taken immediately, (46 sec), after "blue moon" shows no "blue moon."  "blue moon" was not seen on led screen by either me or my companion.  set timer and camera took picture.  we never saw the "blue moon" until we looked at picture.  since we didn't see it until viewing printout no motion was observed.
content.summary: "blue moon" appeared briefly while taking picture of xmas lights in sf

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my room alone as i heard a loud noise in the sky, i rush to my window and see that my puppy willy is dead.  as i run towards it a bright light from the sky structs me and sucks me into a spaceship.
when i open my eyes i see a family of 5 that were aliens they were drinking willy's blood. as i scream like a lil bitch they hit me with a shoe and knocked my unconsions. when i woke up i notice my zipper was down and a strange marsion was smiling...
content.summary: I was sitting in my room alone as i heard a loud noise in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was out walking my dogs on the lake (lake michigan) a  large bright light in the night sky caught my attention. it was if from nowhere a brigthly lit cigar-shaped object appeared from over the water. at first i thought that the object was an airplane, but it didn't display any of the usual aircraft directional lights, it's lights were solid white, and it made no noise as it passed overhead in a north-easterly direction, and moved faster than any plane that i've ever seen, and was out of sight in a matter of seconds.
content.summary: I saw a brightly lit cigar-shaped flew overhead at an incredible rate of speed making no noise.

content.detailedDescription:
(english)

in a starry sky, there was only one cloud on the right side of my house (i always dedicate it to see heaven, because i have several experiences with this phenomenon) and did not pay much importance and enter my home, take a jar and went back the yard of my house and look again at the sky (in the jar i get delayed more than 6 seconds) and had a cloud over my house with an odd shape and look towards the direction of the other cloud, and it was still ayi , there was not any wind, there were no clouds, i began to look very well in several directions to see if there were more clouds and not only that was on my house and the previously mentioned, again there was no wind and the cloud was proportion of spongy, fill the jar with water and went back to my house, but went back outside to see clouds again, and i do not take more than 10 seconds or less and the cloud was over my house was not, and the other cloud ayi it was still the same.

- there was no wind
"the sky was starry
-the movement of the cloud were not always in the same place
- there was not much light pollution (which i really appreciate this)
-camara had no hand
-grave with my cellphone, but could not see anything (the low quality of my cell)
"my reaction to this was utter amazement, as the cloud disappeared very fast and very fast, and there was no wind and there were no clouds, if the cloud disappeared, the other deveria have done the same.


(espa���ol)

en un cielo estrellado , solo habia una nube al lado derecho de mi casa ( siempre me dedico a ver el cielo , ya que tengo varias experiencias con este fenomeno ) y no le preste mucha importancia y entre a mi hogar , saque un jarro y volvi al patio de mi casa y mire nuevamente al cielo ( en sacar el jarro no me demore mas de 6 segundos ) y habia una nube arriba de mi casa con una forma extra���a y mire hacia la direccion de la otra nube , y aun seguia ayi mismo , no habia viento alguno , no habian mas nubes , me dedique a mirar muy bien en varias direcciones a ver si habian mas nubes y no , solamente la que estaba encima de mi casa y la anteriormente nombrada , repito no habia viento y la nube era de proporcion esponjosa , llene el jarro con agua y volvi a mi casa , pero volvi a salir para volver a ver las nubes , y eso no me tomo mas de 10 segundos o menos , y la nube que estaba encima de mi casa no estaba , y la otra nube aun seguia ayi mismo .

- no habia viento
-el cielo era estrellado
-los movimientos de la nube : no tenia siempre en el mismo lugar 
- no habia mucha contaminacion luminica ( cosa que pude apreciar bien esto)
-camara no tenia a mano 
-grave con mi celular , pero no se podia apreciar nada ( la baja calidad de mi celular )
-mi reaccion a esto fue de completo asombro , ya que la nube desaparecio muy rapido y se formo muy rapido , y no habia viento y no habian mas nubes , y si desaparecio una nube , la otra deveria haber hecho lo mismo .
content.summary: Strange clouds above my house

content.detailedDescription: Call me
content.summary: Large,close(less than 100ft overhead)300ft dia.,lights,extremely slow to bizarre fast

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way to work on tuesday night the twenty forth of november and i was watching the sky as i normally do and it seemed there was much activity this night due to all of the airplanes and normal aircraft i see. 
i saw at one point a flashing light which did not strike me as an airplane but it was moving spasmodic and moving in very close to what was pretty clear to be an airplane and it seemed that they were so close that they almost ran into each other and one split second i thought they had hit and then it was all ok and they were on their way in opposite directions. 

i kept watching the sky and as i drew nearer to work i work very near the dfw airport and always see aircraft which i know to be airplanes but tonight there were strange lights in the sky more like spheres, there were about 6 of them flying in and out close to each other and then out again and as i drew near my exit they formed a diagonal line and just hoovered there not moving while other airplanes were flying all around them. 

i am so surprised that nothing has been reported on tv because these were not your usual aircraft in these skies.. i wanted to stop and take pictures but i do not have a great camera on my phone and could not get a view on them so i drove on thinking i would see them when i got to work but when i got to work i could not see for the trees so i was not sure if they left or what they did. 

next time i will be late to work and i plan on buying a really good camera because lately i have seen several sightings in this area... 

who knows maybe someone else will speak up on this i know they had to see them however i think because of the abundant aircraft in these parts no one really pays attention to the lights in the sky..
content.summary: Diagonal formation of lights in the night sky very close together

content.detailedDescription:
Looked up at a south-east direction. checked over head, noticebly clear sky for november. one star shone different than the others. could not detect movement.Conclusion{obect moving away from me at a great distance therof. the lights were very abnormal. not getting excited, i already know that they are here.  and we are seeing them more and more.
   again, the color of the lights were extraordinary, and so many.I was wishing for $3500.00 telescope right there and then.
content.summary: Bright lights. color most interesting, red, white, blue, purple.

content.detailedDescription: I left work at 12am as i work 4pm till 12am, i work in union ville which is approx 15 mins from port jervis were i live, the quickest route is to take the minisink turnpike then to the greenville turnpike, i was driving on the minisink turnpike when i noticed lights in the sky, firstly i thought it was a plane then i noticed it had 5 lights on it from end to end the lights went from blue-white-red-white-blue in that order but the strangest thing was it was turning clockwise slowly and the only sound i could hear was like a cat purring, i slowed the car down to around 20 mph to get a better look then i noticed the size it must of been around 200 feet in length, i proceeded to speed up as i started to get nervous but as it passed over the car the car turned off i came to a stop and grabbed my cell phone and noticed that had turned off too, by this time i didn't know weather to get out of the car and run or stay in my car before i came to the decision the lights had gone out and the car started up i put my foot down a sped up the road not looking back i tell you it was the most unnerving things to happen to me.
content.summary: The object was approx 200 feet in length and there was 5 lights on it blue, white, red, white, blue.

content.detailedDescription:
Some time after 10 pm last night , i spotted a object traveling east to west over the river . at first i thought it was a helicopter . but it had no sound coming from it , not an engine or a jet and no sound from rotor blades . under it , it had two sets of triagler bright red lights , three lights in each set , one set in the front and the other in the back . also it had white lights on the right side of it . 

it was moving slow maybe 20 mph or less , and the height was about 200 feet or so and it was about 600 feet to my left . as it traveled down the river , it looked like it was following the bends of the river . till it fadded out of sight . total time of the sighting was about 2 minutes . 

again no planes or helicopters fly up or down the river . they fly the banks and cross the river , but never drectly over it .
content.summary: Object over tennessee river in knoxvile

content.detailedDescription:
As mentioned above, i was watching departing traffic from mem looking north in the city of cordova when i noticed a triangular shaped object travellint from east to west at approx. mach 1- 1.5 (i have been a commercial pilot since 2001). the object had dull white lights that did not blink, had no strobes, and was completely silent! i passed below some departing traffic, and in relation to the crj-200 that i was watching, it was the size of roughly a football feild. i do not drink, or use drugs...I have studied aircraft since the age of 4....I have never seen anything like this...It left me numb.   


(please keep confidential)  did not even think to grab a camera...I was stuned.
content.summary: I'm a pilot w/ based in mem. i was watchiching departing traffic overhead, and noticed at approx. 290 degrees a diamond shape object with dull white lights travelling at approx mach 1- 1.5 totally silent!

content.detailedDescription:
Some friends and i were at the local airport to observe the shuttle discovery fly over, on approach to ksc (a rare occurance).  we missed the shuttle sighting, though we heard the double sonic booms.  we had been seeing commercial airliners fly over all morning (we are near the butler vor, and most were leaving contrails and we could hear the jet engines. but about 11:50, i was looking straight up from the airport grounds, and observed a small orange object with what appeared to be small black protuberances on the port, and starboard sides. it was traveling about twice as fast as a jetliner (from my perspcective), with no noise or contrail.  its apparent size compared to the jets that had been flying over, if it was at 35,000 feet would have had to be somewhere between 20 and 30' across.  it's direction of travel was nw, with no deviation.  it was small enough, that i didnt want to take my eyes off of it for fear of losing sight of it, even though i had a video camera on me, i would have had to adjust things to get it in the field of view.  kind of made me mad.
my friends with me did not see it, (since it was so small), and because of the nw trajectory, would have been unlikely to be a satelite - most go west to east in some manner.  it disapeard in the distance to the northwest at an elevation of about 45degrees. the protuberances were too small to be wings, so that is a mystery.  i had made notes, but misplaced them, and i had forgotten the exact date, till i went to www.Spaceflightnow.Com to research it...  i and my friends are licenced private pilots with various ratings, and i am a self-employed business owner.  my overall reaction was - wow - and i was trying to get my friends to get a look at it.  it would be nice to have had corroboration.
content.summary: Round object, orange in color, with short black protrusions, port and starboard

content.detailedDescription: Same as my last posting except the object was higher up in the sky about 3000 feet.  bright orb flying almost the exact path as the previous and was not a satellite, no blinking lights or sound coming from it. came from the north west heading south east @ 6:01pm 11/24/2009. lasted for about a minute. i did have the batteries in the camera this time and got a few photos but they don't do it justice. i also have a video i may upload at a later date.
content.summary: Same orb higher altitude hwy.99 & roosevelt

content.detailedDescription: I was driving back to dallas for thanksgiving in the early evening but it was already pretty dark, approximately just before 6 pm. i was approximately at mile marker 60 on i-35 (about 20 miles north of ardmore, ok) i noticed a bright light in the sky and leaned forward to get a better view.  i thought at first it was a plane but whatever the object was it was was producing more light than i have seen a plane ever make.  it also was not flashing or pulsating light either just shining. i could make out something was inside the light but could not make out a shape.  it did look like one end looked like the end of a thin cigar (thinning out towards a tip).  after leaning forward i noticed hover for a second longer then it all of a sudden flashed and disappeared completely.  the flash was a decent amount brighter than it had been just before.  i kept looking after and could not see anything else in the sky.  there were no visible stars yet.  it was too high to be the top of a tower or any other ground anchored light.
content.summary: A bright light with some sort of object and gone with a flash.

content.detailedDescription:
(copied the e-mail witness sent me-adam mason -fi 10332)
i am writing to someon from mufon to describe it in unusual siting. this occurred sometime ago in northern michigan. the craft can best be described as a hugely elongated propane tank.Tank i saw it airborn for four or 5 minutes in the daytime with crystal blue skies. of course, these are estimates for an unknown craft. i would say that it was 30 to 40 feet in diameter and two or 300 feet long. both ends were rounded and it looked all the world like a long propane tank. during the few minutes i saw it traveling slowly above the tree line.It slowly moved in profile from my right to left. again another guess, i think it was at eight or 10,000 feet. it traveled across the highway i was slowly driving down and began to turn towards me traveling just left of the highway. i saw the object from the side, the front, and underneath. i have heard discussion regarding this common shape and also seen a similar craft on ufo programming. the flying propane tank had two distinct characteristics that i would like to discuss was someone who has a good historilogical knowledge of similar shaped crafts.     my name is [cms/tg/pid] and i can be reached at [cms/tg/pid] or [cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: Man driving saw a propane shaped craft flying in the sky, craft later turned and witness drove underneath the craft.

content.detailedDescription:
I work on the 14th floor of the cnn building in hollywood.  i was getting some water from the fountain when i noticed a bright seemingly stationary object in the western sky, possibly above the ocean.  i began to observe the object because i've worked here for a year and have never seen planes in that portion of the sky.  one would think that there would be a flight path leading into los angeles int'l there but i truly have never observed planes flying in from that direction.  plus, this object was too high to be a plane on approach (i'd estimate several thousand feet) and there was something about this light that didn't indicate 'airplane' to me.  it was just too bright.

shortly after another object appeared to the right of the first.

while the initial object was remaining still this one appeared to be moving slowly to the right.  both objects then grew intensely bright before quickly fading out of view.  after about 5 minutes the stationary object reappeared in the same location.  it sat there again for a few minutes, grew very bright and then quickly faded away.  this repeated numerous times over the course of about 45 minutes.  the second object wouldn't always appear but when it did it was always in a different portion of the sky.  sometimes it appeared to traverse a great distance in a very short period of time.  twice the objects appeared right next to each other while another time one was above the other and sometimes when only one was visible the other would fade into view as the other faded out.

i have been a ufo enthusiast for the majority of my life and have never seen anything i truly believed to be worthy of a ufo claim.  watching these objects i felt completely ecstatic and excited.  i should also mention that about a dozen other people i work with observed them too.

something i find fascinating is that they appeared in the portion of the sky where i believe the infamous objects did in 1942 during 'the battle of los angeles'.  also that they seemed to be over the water and near catalina island which i've read is a uso & ufo hot spot.

anyways, i just wanted to share and hope i'm not the only one!

- zack whitford

p.S.  i see someone reported seeing a bright disc in the sky not far from where i am on nov. 22, two nights ago.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two bright objects, one stationary and one appearing in different spots, appeared intermittently in the western sky.

content.detailedDescription:
File 2:  taken on 28/05/2008 @ 01:35 am
file 3.  taken on 08/06/2008 @ 23:55 pm
content.summary: Multiple coloured lights

content.detailedDescription: Between 8:00 and 8:10 i was at my house putting up christmas lights when i saw what i thought to be geese flying in a v shape.  realizing it was dark and the geese would have to be glowing i realized it was about fifty lights compact relatively close together in a large v shape.  they were rather dim and white but with a slight light green tint to them.  they did not blink or strobe but seemed as if they had free will to move as they please while still staying in a v position, much like a bird.  i heard no noise whatsoever and it was up about where you would see birds flying.  i realized after about ten seconds that what i was seeing was extraordinary.  the lights went over my head and i watched it disappear into the horizon.  as it went away the shape looked like a strait line as a v would look from the back but and more of a hook on the left side.  i don't know how fast it was going, it wasn't going too fast but fast enough that between the time i saw it and it moving into the horizon i would say it took between a minute and a minute and a half.  it kept steady pace and did not seem to drop or rise in elevation.  i do not claim to have seen a ship or saucer for i saw no metal or frame.  all i claim to have seen was lights but as close as it was i should have seen a frame.  i was actually not scared but quite excited about what happened.  i have never seen a ufo before and would say i am a "open-minded skeptic", but what i saw was not an airplane, at least not as we know it.  it was the weirdest thing i have ever seen.  i have searched for other videos or pics or descriptions and haven't seen one quite like this...It was up very close and very surreal.  it felt like i could reach out and touch it.
content.summary: About 50 lights shaped in a slow moving v flying at low altitude.

content.detailedDescription:
For about two weeks rr, ru, j and i heard on the radio station kq 106 reports of u.F.O. activity around kearney, lexington and north platte, which are cities of nebraska.  the most reported observations were a bright multicolor object near lexington.  this bright light was reported being seen every night at 9 o���clock pm to the southwest.  we read the kearney hub newspaper which had an article about this object in lexington and in another news paper an object landing at or hovering at north platte���s air field which radar did not detect but witnesses called it in to police station.  other reports in the one of the papers and radio stations were of objects that made red streaks, even in the day time, right down main streets of lexington and north platte.  we even listened to a guy calling in to the radio, chasing one by kearney near cotton mill park west of kearney.

 2.  i said ���let���s go and investigate this thing tomorrow night and see what the fuss is all about.   maybe if we are lucky we will high jack one and beam up all our friends and beer and destroy all the communist nations and explore the universe.���  they laughed but i just smiled.  we agreed to meet at the fraternity at 7 o���clock pm and leave by 7:30 pm.

3.   rr arrived as always late at 7:45 pm and drove.  we reached the krazy dicks convenience store at 8:36 pm, which is south of the lexington i-80 interchange.  we got some snacks and pop and met a nebraska state trooper.  rr went over to talk to him about this object that was being reported in the newspaper and radio station.  he told us it was in the south west sky about foot or so above the horizon and to get a good look to go past johnson lake and find a high hill.  ���you cannot miss it because it turns different colors.���  then he pointed the direction and height of the light and asked if we had seen it yet.  rr said ���no, but we are curious to see it.���  then for some strange reason the trooper got mad and stormed off.  i do not know if ru (who did not believe any of this) made a face or gesture.  rr said ���i know a hill where you can see johnson lake and the city of lexington.��� 
 
4.  we arrived on top of this hill and there was an unharvested corn field to the north of us and pasture land in all the other directions.   you could see somewhat johnson lake to the northwest for it was dusk and the tall corn blocked full view.  it was 9:10pm when we arrived on this hill and started viewing. we saw nothing.  i said ���rr if you had any sense of time we would had seen it.  the state patrolman said it was out there right now and he was pointing out where to look and how high it was hovering.���  then we decided to leave and as we got in the car i saw a light that was as bright as venus but only 12 inches up from the horizon.  i said it is moving or bobbing.  we got gathered together and this light was changing colors from red to yellow, than green and finally blue.  ru said it is venus setting.  i said look out of your corner of your eye and see the action.  j freaked out when she discovered what i was seeing.  rr said he could see it but, ru could not -- we figure he had contacts in.  it was bobbing like a bobber on wavy water and then it would circle two to four times and repeat the cycle.  but if you looked directly at it would be stationary.  ru said he heard a u.F.O. expert that gave a lecture at kearney state college that this object is venus and the atmospheric pressure was changing causing venus to turn colors and make it appear moving around.  i said ���no, because venus sets more to the north and not to the southwest.  don���t you think a state patrolman knows the difference between venus and this light?���  he said ���i do not see it moving or changing color.���  we all argued with him and i said we need to get closer.  

5.  we headed back to i-80 and ru said ���go straight through lexington to bone road to a hill that overlooks lexington and surrounding area where you can see for miles all around.���  i kept my eyes on the light in the back seat driver���s side and lost it in the trees going around johnson lake.  i said ���ru's plan sounds good to me, for i lost it.���

6.   bone road got its name from the dirt being off white color and very dusty.  we got to the hill about 5 miles outside of lexington at 9:30 pm.  we could not see the light to the west and scanning the sky we spotted another multicolored object to the north east.  this one was bobbing and circling only at a much faster pace.   you could look at it directly and see the motion, at  which j got scared and hid in the car on the floor board.  ru said ���it is a farm yard light which the light was very low to the horizon.���  i replied ���no, it was slightly higher, about 2 inches off the horizon and the distance looks like it is 20  or 30 miles  away,��� and i pointed to a farm house to the north with a light about 2 miles away and said ���see the difference.���  ru began to be puzzled and confused.  then he said ���betelgeuse is the star!���  i said ���how it can be for it is below the star horizon.���   it was making the same color patterns as before and this light is the same one as the western one.  it had must have moved.  then i got a funny feeling and turned and looked over my shoulder and saw the first one barely above the ground.  it too was bouncing like crazy and circling.  j screamed ���get in the car and let���s get out of here.���  rr, who was her fianc���, said to be quiet and sit still.  then the objects stood still and began to change colors from yellow to red than to green and blue.  they were headed to meet above us and as they came closer the yellow seem to be in front and as it turned away the back was blue.  ru said it is like the rainbow.  they seemed to be about 5 miles away and were as big and bright as a full moon.  we were all in awe and fear and i said ���my wish may come true.���  our heads were looking almost straight up for they had to be at least a mile apart and in full view of our eye sight.  i would guess about a half a mile high.  they were bright white lights and round.  we made some moaning and groaning noises and i said ���what a way to go!��� and ���take no hostages!���  when they got to the closest point, about one eight of a mile or about 6 inches apart, the area around us lit up twice as bright as a full moon and then they shot back to their original positions.  then the westward one disappeared.  the northern one held still like a star.  we looked at each other and realized we were on our knees and we were confused how we got into this position.  j was screaming and lying under the dashboard.  i told the guys ���i think they knew we were here and fled.���  i said ���let���s head for the northern one, for it has to be 20 miles or so northeast.���  ru, familiar with the area said ���it has to be by ansley, nebraska.���

7.  we hit highway 40 about 10 miles east of eddyville and headed east.  got between eddyville and sumner and dart-like things, i called them, began streaking all over the northern hemisphere.  all directions up from the horizon above the horizon to down straight across east to west and west to east and they had a red streak constantly following the object.  i was screaming ���pull over, pull over.���  ru saw some and said ���it���s a meteorite shower.  i said ���the hell you say -- when a meteorite comes up from the horizon and straight across the sky and has a tail that stays the same length about 3 to 6 inches and it is red!���  i had a few cuss words to get the urgency to pull over and finally we turned off on a road.  

8.  we had alfalfa fields between the highway and railroad tracks, with clear vision of the horizon with a view to the west, south, and east.   the north had hills and the big dipper was southwest west or over my shoulder, looking straight ahead at taurus constellation.  these little dart things reminded me of the fighter jet exhaust or afterburners we saw one evening before this event.  i believe they were slightly smaller than a fighter jet, but every time they sped up 3 to 6 inch red streaks would appear.  otherwise they were white small round objects and had the brightness and size of jupiter.  if one could imagine using peripheral vision at the whole northern hemisphere one could see what appeared to be hundreds of objects streaking all over.  a freaky and random thing!  we were all amazed at the sight.  i remember looking again over my shoulder feeling the west object must be coming but it never again appeared.  i saw a steel quonset, which would have blocked my vision of it, and the big dipper slightly north of the quonset.  the object could have been behind that building but this was my gut feeling only and none of the dart objects were in that area or southern hemisphere.  i said to the guys, because j was hiding in the car, ���i am going to stop that car i spotted west bound to witness this.���  i took off running to the highway about 100 yards or so and they began to yell at me to look.  i got in the middle of the highway to stop the car and it swerved away as i jumped back and it kept going.  

9.  i then turned around and saw the most awesome site���they were forming a formation around the big object.  this object or light was twice as big as the little objects.  first formation was a perfect octagon and in the center was the big object.  then the rest, like a magnet drawing things to it, formed a perfect circle around the octagon.  if one again could imagine you could see a line or stop sign shape and a perfect circle and dead in the center a big object or light.   this formation covered north northeast quadrant or in the constellation orion.  your vision looking at would cover three quarters of it; to give you an idea how vast this formation was.  the thing that bugs me is trying to put in a box or having a ceiling which it did not.  i cannot explain the magnitude of the range but simply using the boy scout method in measuring trees by using a sick and lining the top of the tree and using your thumb to mark the bottom and laying it sideways and have someone line up next to the tree and count the steps, depending how wide the steps are, is the length of the tree.  measuring it my mind and sticking a tape measure straight out in front me it would be 2 feet across.  or 1 foot to the center.  laying it down and having a person at 20 miles away or directly under it start walking and counting the paces one can see the vastness of it.  i say 20 miles because the location ru guessed was ansley, nebraska.  my calculations, though i am poor at math, are 1.2 miles per inch.  taking 24 divided by 20 equals 1.2 miles per inch.  this is my educated guess.  knowing this i measured at the time by using fingers from the center to the octagon as being 6 inches and 6 inches from the octagon to the circle.  this is recorded in my first written account.  the bottom of the circle was about 12 inches from the ground.  ru said it covers orion.  now my imagination was turning to astrology and the bible, for this is an omen of something to happen.  this is a message.  "it is a sign," i told them.  of course, ru said "it is the devil."  rr said nothing.  i said "did you count how many objects are in the circle?"  no response.  ���24,��� i said!  ���8 to make the octagon and one big in the middle and they are in the constellation orion?���  the total was 33 in all and spaced 6 inches apart from each other.  rr said ���it might be you and you have us in a mass hallucination.���  i said ���how in the hell would i think of this?���  they laughed.  

10.  now if you see a 24 hour clock, like in the military, the top is 12 am and the bottom 12pm or zero hundred at the top and twelve hundred hours on the bottom.  then the next event happened.  the ten hundred hour object in the circle broke ranks and the object from the octagon at the eight hundred hour point chased the renegade.  it looked like a dog fight and every time they accelerated the red streak would follow.  they went around in circles in all kinds of directions but in an area or box about five inches square and about two or three inches from the ground.  this was bizarre because there was no depth, it was just two dimensional.  then after a few seconds the one in the circle streaked out toward the horizon or fell straight out into space or toward the horizon.  then the other returned to its position in the octagon and they all stayed still for a few seconds and then darted off in all directions.  the main object stayed still like a star.

11.  by this time it was 3:00 am and we wanted to go to ansley.  but rr needed gas so we headed to his parent���s farm down the road.  about 3:30am we arrived at his parent���s house and woke them up and got binoculars out to see this object.  we all saw that it rotated in a clock wise fashion and had a short tail that sparked like a comets tail.  when the tail faced you it was yellow and as it moved away it turned red then green and away from you it was blue and the pattern ran in reverse as it turned back.  when i got the binoculars and looked at it, the thing or light broke away and the same time everyone yelled it is breaking apart and something is entering it.  which it did and the dart thing entered and it closed.  it was like a cup of water and one swirls the center which opens but still stays intact and after wards gels together again.

[material having to do with personal beliefs omitted here]

12.  there was a hog farmer in the area, which one of my friends talked to, and he saw the formation and everything and said he never would speak of it again and would kill my friend if his name got out.  his hogs were acting up about 10pm and went to the farrowing house to see if an animal got in.  he saw the streaks of light and the formation and the dog fight.

13.  i am sure there are others out there that had to have seen this event, but they are afraid like the newspaper reported.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw darting white objects with red tails.  saw a concentric octagon & circular formation of lites; two left formation and had a dogfight.
